metadata.name: English Breakfast
metadata.description:
English Breakfast with the painting wife.

The piece from Promo of the First ever fully digital performance, made in London (UK) in 2016.  
Promo where artist married his favorite painting and the couple are having their first breakfast after the marriage.
The promo cosplayed commercial artists, trying to achieve the audience interest and attention.

1-month fully digital performance included 3 main parts:

1. Statement, claiming all the painting produced for it would be destroyed in 1 month if not sold via digital platform.
2. Promo, cosplaying the promos of the artists like Tracy Emin & Damien Hirst
3. Final piece - a documented video (quite controversial) - what the artist has done with the rest of unsold paintings.

Materials used: Oil on Canvas, Photography, Post-Production software.

London, 2016
